subject: Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
World Series
lead_paragraph: Gutteridge played for the St. Louis Cardinals’ Gashouse Gang and became the last surviving player for the St. Louis Browns to appear in that lowly franchise’s lone World Series.
snippet: Gutteridge played for the St. Louis Cardinals’ Gashouse Gang and became the last surviving player for the St. Louis Browns to appear in that lowly franchise’s lone World Series.
